example_sentences.eng_trans: a singer with an outstandingly [exceptionally] powerful voice
a detergent which is exceptionally effective at getting out the dirt
have outstanding [exceptional] abilities; be outstanding [exceptional] 《at doing, in one's abilities》
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 抜群の能力を持っている

example_sentences.eng_trans: display outstanding powers; be far stronger than anyone else; be tremendous
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 抜群の強さを発揮する
抜群の成績で卒業する

example_sentences.eng_trans: He received an award for his outstanding achievements.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 抜群の功績があったとして彼は表彰された.

example_sentences.eng_trans: His role in the game was quite outstanding. ｜ He made a distinguished contribution to the game.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: その試合における彼の働きは抜群であった.

example_sentences.eng_trans: He is exceptionally good at jokes so he is very popular in the class. ｜ His tremendous sense of humor makes him very popular in the class.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 彼は抜群に冗談がうまいので, クラスの人気者だ.

example_sentences.eng_trans: A lot of animals are fast runners, but the cheetah is way ahead of the rest [preeminent in this respect].
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 足の速い動物はいろいろいるが, その中でもチーターは抜群に速い.

example_sentences.eng_trans: I just changed my grip slightly and the ball really flew.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 握りを変えただけで, ボールが抜群に飛ぶようになった.

example_sentences.eng_trans: become outstanding [exceptional]; get (way) ahead; (come to) stand [stick] out.
Taken up by the media everyday, the village suddenly found itself famous [shot to prominence].
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 毎日のようにマスコミに取り上げられたのでその村は一躍知名度が抜群になった.
